MotdConfig._comment: %cond% for weather conditions, %temp% for temperature in fahrenheit, %time% for current time (hh:mm a), %name% for name
MotdConfig.motd: Hey %name%, it's %time%. Looks like it's %cond% and %temp% degrees
MotdConfig.motdNoWeather: Hey %name%, it's %time%, and I'm getting the weather -- ask again soon with /motd
